description: Tests for priority order (validity > positivity > sparity) and subject order (x before y)

cases.name: validity_over_positivity_empty_vs_negative
cases.description: Empty x should report validity, not positivity on negative y

cases.name: validity_over_positivity_nan_vs_negative
cases.description: NaN in x should report validity, not positivity on negative y

cases.name: validity_over_sparity
cases.description: Empty x should report validity, not sparity on constant y

cases.name: positivity_over_sparity_ratio
cases.description: Negative x should report positivity, not sparity on constant y (for Ratio, y is never checked for sparity)

cases.name: x_before_y_validity_both_empty
cases.description: Both empty should report x first

cases.name: x_before_y_validity_both_nan
cases.description: Both contain NaN should report x first

cases.name: x_before_y_positivity_both_negative
cases.description: Both negative should report x first

cases.name: x_before_y_positivity_both_zero
cases.description: Both contain zero should report x first

cases.name: x_before_y_sparity_both_constant
cases.description: Both constant should report x first

cases.name: x_before_y_sparity_both_single
cases.description: Both single element should report x first

cases.name: spread_validity_over_sparity
cases.description: Empty spread should report validity (priority 0), not sparity
